name: UGameFeatureAction_DataRegistry
doc: Specifies a list of Data Registries to load and initialize with this feature

RegistriesToAdd: List of registry assets to load and initialize
bPreloadInEditor: If true, this will preload the registries when the feature is registered in the editor to support the editor pickers
bPreloadInCommandlets: If true, this will preload the registries when the feature is registered whilst a commandlet is running
